transactions.details: Chicago White Soxplaced LFBrooks Baldwinon the 10-day injured list retroactive to July 8, 2025. Lower back strain.
Boston Red Soxsent RHPTanner Houckon a rehab assignment to Worcester Red Sox.
New York Yankeesdesignated RHPGeoff Hartliebfor assignment.
New York Yankeesselected the contract of RHPCam Schlittlerfrom Scranton/Wilkes-Barre RailRiders.
Chicago White Soxrecalled 1BTim Elkofrom Charlotte Knights.
